articles.description: In Q2 2023, ABB’s order inflows rose 10% year-on-year to  ₹3,044 crore despite a high base, and order book stood at  ₹7,727 crore.
articles.content: ABB India Ltds shares have been on a roll, appreciating by a whopping 68% so far this calendar year. A good part of investors optimism stems from the companys order inflow trajectory, which has been … [+2398 chars]

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Jio Financial Services may be the next largecap inclusion in Jan 2024 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: With the removal of Jio Financial shares from NSE Indices, passive funds tracking those indices will have to adjust their portfolios. The adjustment is scheduled for final 30 minutes of trading on September 6.
articles.content: Note To ReadersDisclosure: Network18, the parent company of CNBCTV18.com, is controlled by Independent Media Trust, of which Reliance Industries is the sole beneficiary.
